meanings.sent1: The heat resinifies the sap, turning it into a sticky substance.
meanings.sent2: She resinifies the wood to protect it from water damage.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion resinifies the ordinary rock into a precious gem.
meanings.sent4: His words resinify the situation, making it more complicated than it seems.
meanings.sent5: The artist resinifies the clay, transforming it into a beautiful sculpture.

meanings.sent1: He resinifies the paper to make it waterproof.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman resinifies the basket to make it sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The chef resinifies the meat, giving it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her touch resinifies the fabric, making it shiny and durable.
meanings.sent5: The gardener resinifies the plant pots for added protection against the elements.

meanings.sent1: Over time, the tree resinifies, forming a protective layer.
meanings.sent2: The paint resinifies as it dries, creating a glossy finish.
meanings.sent3: The candy resinifies in the sun, becoming sticky and sweet.
meanings.sent4: The glue resinifies quickly, bonding the pieces together.
meanings.sent5: The substance resinifies when exposed to heat, hardening into a solid mass.
